price: (28) And he felt from them apprehension.[1540] They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.
arabic: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۖ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ
